message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You wanted 60-40, I'll offer 70-30. What do you say?
You're getting closer, but I still want a bit more. How about 55-45?
You're getting closer to 60-40, but I'm still a bit short. I'll meet you in the middle at 55-45, but I'll take the higher amount. What do you say?
Let's meet in the middle at 50-50. It's time to wrap this up!
